wikipedia_page.main: Ashley Winn (born 1 December 1985) is an English semi-professional footballer who plays for Farnborough as a midfielder.

response: On 14 July 2012, he joined Ebbsfleet United on trial and came off the bench to score in a 6–1 away win in a friendly fixture with Tonbridge Angels. He also played in Fleet's friendly with Leyton Orient but was released along with fellow trialists Ashley Winn and Kirk Hudson.http://www.kentonline.co.uk/gravesend_messenger/sport/2012/july/25/liam_daish.aspx
